snippet: Gunmen killed Mohamed Mohamud Heyd and his bodyguard in a drive-by shooting in Mogadishu, the capital, according to the police.
abstract: Gunmen kill Somali lawmaker Mohamed Mohamud Heyd and his bodyguard in drive-by shooting in Mogadishu; extremist group Shabab claims responsibility.
lead_paragraph: Gunmen killed Mohamed Mohamud Heyd and his bodyguard in a drive-by shooting in Mogadishu, the capital, according to the police.

headline.main: Gunmen in Somalia Kill a Lawmaker
